name: EOVIST

indications.text: eovist indicated intravenous magnetic resonance imaging ( mri ) liver detect characterize lesions patients known suspected focal liver disease .

contraindications.text: • recommended dose 0.1 ml/kg body weight ( 2.1 ) • administer intravenous injection recommended rate 1 ml 2 ml per second ( 2.2 ) • follow injection normal saline flush ( 2.2 )

adverseReactions: eovist contraindicated patients history severe hypersensitivity eovist [ ( 5.3 ) ] .
indications_original: EOVIST is indicated for intravenous use in magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the liver to detect and characterize lesions in patients with known or suspected focal liver disease.
contraindications_original: • Recommended dose is 0.1 mL/kg body weight ( 2.1 ) • Administer as an intravenous injection at a recommended rate of 1 mL to 2 mL per second ( 2.2 ) • Follow injection with a normal saline flush ( 2.2 )
